INPUT.SEARCH_STRING_INFO: Use special characters for advanced searches: & for AND, | for OR, ! for NOT, (...) to group terms, and "..." for exact phrases. Example: !cat & (dog | "white mice")
INPUT.SCOPE_INFO: Search scope: 'Paragraph' will consider your search criteria within the entire paragraph, while 'Sentence' will narrow the criteria to individual sentences.
INPUT.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: You must enter at least one search term

RESULTS.GO_TO_TEXT_TOOLTIP: Jump to the paragraph in the full text

UPLOAD.TOOLTIP: Select the work you want to upload

BAD_REQUEST.EMPTY_WORKS_SELECTION: You must select at least one work.
